channel.title: General Sick Neti Pot on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Sick Neti Pot on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: neti pots are rough. well not as rough.. but still a bit rough..
item.description: So today after running some errands downtown i came home and about died. I slept like a baby until around 10. confused and hungry i awoke. I felt like hell still. which sucked. I was totally (totally dude) supposed to go to a bbq around 7. But i just didn’t have it in me. and now its 11:39 and i am still achey and tired. However, after i ate and chilled for a minute, i decided to try the neti pot again.
